section.title: The Goal of Analyzes
section.para: The goal of any Analysis can be described in a simple sentence: The Analysis takes a file and generates a Universal Syntax Tree. What a universal syntax tree is, is described in the Source Code Analysis and Evaluation manual.

A more complex and more complete answer is, that an analysis generates an Universal Syntax Tree for files which are recognized as known and support which contains all information which are needed or valuable for a later evaluator.
